messages.content: In Which countries is Edina a common first name?

I'm sorry, but I am not able to browse the internet, so I am not able to provide information about the use of the name Edina as a given name in specific countries. However, I can tell you that the name Edina is a Hungarian name that means "beautiful", and it is also commonly used in other countries such as Croatia, Serbia, and Slovenia.
Is it usually a male or a female name?

The name Edina can be used as a given name for either males or females, depending on the country and the cultural context in which it is used. In Hungary, for example, it is more commonly used as a female given name, while in Croatia and Serbia, it is more commonly used as a male given name. In the English-speaking world, it is more commonly used as a female given name. Ultimately, the name Edina can be used for both males and females, and its use as a given name will depend on the cultural and personal preferences of the person named Edina, as well as the cultural context in which they live.
